response.summary:
Tania Gomez is an Electronics Engineer from Universidad Nacional de Colombia, candidate for MSc degree in Electronics Engineering. She has experience in electrical metrology and electrical tests, estimation of uncertainties, ISO-IEC 17025 standard and quality systems management. She has experience in design and research in power electronics, optoelectronics and metrology.

Her current interest are research activities, electrical metrology, instrumentation and electrical tests, power electronics and optoelectronics.
response.skills: Microsoft Office, Microsoft Excel, Inglés, Investigación, Trabajo en equipo, Calibración, Aptitudes de laboratorio, Matlab, KiCAD, C++, C, Simulaciones, Electrónica, Electrónica de potencia, Fibra óptica, AutoCAD, Programación, Administración y dirección de empresas, Servicio de atención al cliente

company.name: C-Therm Technologies Ltd.
company.description: C-Therm is the global leader in non-destructive thermal conductivity testing.  Providing solutions for R&D, production, and QC applications, our patented MTPS platform technology delivers non-destructive, fast, and accurate measurement of thermal conductivity and effusivity in seconds; all with a virtually unlimited sample size.
